scanner.analysis

Class TextParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • scanner.analysis.TextParser

  • public class TextParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by chris on 10/22/16. TextParser takes Plaintext input and stems it, searches for those stemmed words in the database, and then uses CalculateEmailScore to derive a score for that email text.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Database db 
      private LuceneStemmer ls 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Doublet> pairs 
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> text

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Phrase findPhrase(java.lang.String phrase)
      Finds a word in the database and creates a Phrase object for that phrase
      private Word findWord(java.lang.String word)
      Finds a word in the database and creates a Word object for that word
      double parse()
      Takes the text that was inputted in the constructor, finds any confidential words in the database, then gets the conf and norm values from each word, and passes them to CalculateEmailScore to generate a score.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public double parse()
        Takes the text that was inputted in the constructor, finds any confidential words in the database, then gets the conf and norm values from each word, and passes them to CalculateEmailScore to generate a score.
        Returns:
        - A score of how likely the text is to be confidential.

      • findWord

        private Word findWord(java.lang.String word)
        Finds a word in the database and creates a Word object for that word
        Parameters:
        word - - a word to check in the database
        Returns:
        - a Word object for the String word with its database attributes

      • findPhrase

        private Phrase findPhrase(java.lang.String phrase)
        Finds a word in the database and creates a Phrase object for that phrase
        Parameters:
        phrase - - a phrase to check in the database
        Returns:
        - a Phrase object for the String word with its database attributes
